summary: Adds a half sized Snowy Sabre Cat follower into your game, for your enjoyment :)
descriptionHtml:
this mod simply adds a small Snowy Sabre Cat follower to Proudspire Manor in Skyrim (half the size, twice the awesome) I mean who doesn't want a cute little baby Sabre Cat following you?

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/37299-1-1371467280.png[/img]



~Details about him~

Name: Blizzard
Size: 50% (or 25% if you download CubSized version)
location: Proudspire Manor, Master bedroom - Blizzards Rest (Immersive Version)
Mortal?: no he should not be able to die (comment if he does, tell me how he dies)
Compatible with non-animal followers?: yes




~Immersive Version!!!~

A baby Snowy Sabre Cat has been taken by a BMG (Big Mean Giant - not to be confused with the BFG), He was carried away as the Giant squashed his mother, leaving him distressed and in need of a friend to look after him The giants home is often known as Blizzards Rest, and thus the sabre cat has adopted the name of the place he lies waiting. You, mighty Dragonborn must save this poor Sabre Cat, defeat his captor, and gain his trust (he might even help you kill him).




-WARNING-

ONLY CHOOSE ONE MAIN FILE!





~Requirements?~

-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks[/url] (sometimes works without this, but mine doesn't, so i have put it here)
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45919/?]Sabrecat Animation Fix v2[/url] (For those experiencing problems with vanilla animations)
-If you want a faster moving sabrecat, Bring up the console an use the commandÂ 'modav speedmult ###' replace # with your desired number [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4855610/?]timeandahalf[/url] suggests 170




Amount of Mods i have made?

The first mod I made was a Lunari follower, but have not uploaded it, this is my second mod (the Lunari follower is the other follower in the image)






Credits:
Bethesda (Thanks for making Skyrim, a game with cool creatures :P [pun intended])
bhaktisean (for making the Lunari race)
Frigus (For making the TERA armour version i have on my Lun ari follower)
asianboy345 (For the TERA Armor Collection UNP used by Frigus)
author: OfficialBurrn
